edited_stories.edited_story_text: The art gallery was amazing . There were a lot of paintings from different periods, and some of them were absolutely gorgeous. There was a coastal scene with fishing boats and sailboats that was beautiful. I loved the paintings of the small towns that depicted the townspeople and their animals. I also was impressed by a very detailed still life of a flowering plant that looked like it would jump off the canvas.
